channel.title: Abouts on Shelta
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Shelta

item.title: Dreams are cool, but reality is better!
item.description: Here’s a glimpse into what the first version of New York Villa looks like: Beautiful right? You’ll be captivated by this quality, low maintenance 225 square contemporary estate. Set in a quiet family-oriented community, there’s ease of access to local shops, sport centers, the freeway and it’s just 2 minutes drive from to Shelta New York Villa I. This striking estate offers contemporary Nigerian family living at its best. If you’ve always wanted a low maintenance home set amongst nature, and also have every convenience at your fingertips, the complete package is presented here.
